subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Texas running back Tre’ Newton, son of the former Dallas Cowboys lineman Nate Newton, said he was giving up football on team doctors’ advice after several concussions in college and high school.
snippet: Texas running back Tre’ Newton, son of the former Dallas Cowboys lineman Nate Newton, said he was giving up football on team doctors’ advice after several concussions in college and high school.
